metadata.title: Councils of Insight — Divination and Secret Retrieval
metadata.summary: Indexed spirits sought when truth, intelligence, or hidden caches must be uncovered without alerting rival courts.

references.title: Dictionnaire Infernal
references.author: Jacques Collin de Plancy
references.note: Illustrated attestations for Haures, Vassago, and fellow truth-bearers.

references.title: The Book of Abramelin
references.author: Abraham of Worms
references.note: Provides warding frameworks for interrogating knowledge spirits safely.

references.title: The Testament of Solomon
references.author: F. C. Conybeare (trans.)
references.note: Lists constraints Solomon used against questioners and archivists alike.

body: Invoke these entities when intelligence must be harvested quietly: they read minds, reveal caches, and surface secrets but demand disciplined questioning.

Dantalion — Purpose: Mirror the thoughts of targets to predict their decisions. Manifestation: scholar bearing many faces of men and women at once. Favours: bound folios containing charcoal portraits of intended subjects. Wards: steady heartbeat exercises and mirrored wards to reflect his empathic projections.

Caim — Purpose: Stall inquisitions with riddled answers until the summoner is ready to act. Manifestation: blackbird courtier perched upon a blade of frost. Favours: ink diluted with rainwater to blur certainties. Wards: write questions, seal them in wax, and open only after he departs so his paradox cannot attach.

Foras — Purpose: Catalogue uncommon herbs, stones, and hidden archives needed for complex rites. Manifestation: lion-faced philosopher counting on copper abaci. Favours: labelled apothecary drawers and meticulously ordered specimen trays. Wards: maintain transparent inventories reviewed aloud at dawn to prevent quiet substitutions.

Haures (Flauros) — Purpose: Extract hard truths about present or future events while threatening anyone unshielded. Manifestation: terrible leopard engulfed in radiance. Favours: sealed braziers inscribed with precise inquiries. Wards: stand within a triangle dusted with alum and cooled coals; break the interview the instant his temper rises.

Vassago — Purpose: Recover lost knowledge and verify the veracity of prophecies. Manifestation: mild-mannered prince carrying an hourglass that runs backward. Favours: sand timers turned thrice precisely before consultation. Wards: stagger bells to disrupt linear time so his truths cannot anchor uninvited destinies.

Valac — Purpose: Reveal concealed caches, hidden gateways, or buried contraband. Manifestation: child with angel wings riding a twin-headed dragon. Favours: miniature chests filled with river stones and sealed with beeswax. Wards: map lattices folded in iron cases prior to questioning keep his curiosities contained.
